name: Under Raps
description:
Under Raps is a rapping mixed with charades type of game. This will require with four or more players.  As a team, a player will draw a card with a word on it. Their job is to make a rap about the word. The team's objective is to guess what that player is rapping about. If the team guesses correctly, if not the other team can steal. 

First to five wins!

Playing Cards IO version:

https://playingcards.io/nmuabx
